title: MegaTech Project: Goal-Oriented Computer Systems Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computer hardware/software architecture, operating systems, and applications
context.additional_context: Utilizing discussion boards/assignment submission features within the LMS, providing technical tutorial videos

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three computing requirements for target groups according to given scenarios
Learners can select appropriate hardware/software combinations within budget constraints
Learners can logically describe the validity rationale for the selected system configuration in 500+ characters
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
